content: I worked with Rafael at Jobscore during a few months. In that short period, he made a great impact in the engineering department. From introducing new front-end practices to a whole new approach to reuse UI code. I recommend Rafael to teams looking for professionals well versed with software fundamentals, long practice and high delivery capacity.

Rafael was responsible to introduce a new approach on how we organised JavaScript code on Jobscore. He is one of the best engineers I had the privilege to work with. I think his best trait is making sure that everything is reusable, easy to understand and maintainable.

Rafael is one of the most creative and productive people I know. Also, the technical quality of what he builds is enviable. He always brings something new in his side projects. He’s a person that practices and reflects a lot about his profession. The results are evident.
